en: sound of hands clapping as a sign of respect

ngiemboon: Mé tyé mvfò fùɔ, ńcúa mbwó lê tsùb tsùb.
en: In front of the king we clap our hands “tsùb tsùb”.
They cut the tuft of grass.

ngiemboon: Mbʉ̀ŋ lɔɔn ńdúu jʉʼɔɔn sésag, ejʉʼ sẅé lê tsẅêd.
en: If it rains too much here, the place will be very humid.
